name: Stop 'n Go Racing
description:
A mix of turn based and racing, you push your desired direction while time is stopped and then watch your car stick to those inputs for the next moment, controls are the left thumbstick and the triggers.

This entry requires a controller, sorry I didn't add keyboard support in time, I forgot you actually get an extra hour to submit, also the retry button doesn't work sometimes, so that's a shame too.
I used sfxr for the engine sound, all models and 'textures' are my own.

I'm not able to test any builds besides windows so let me know if they don't work.

Edit: Added a post jam version with various changes
